attributes.action: Abolish plans to erect future speed cameras and remove existing speed cameras of all types
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrap plans to build new speed cameras.

Remove all existing speed cameras.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish plans to erect future speed cameras and remove existing speed cameras of all types."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14709.asp

Prime Minister's Office
